name: zombie company
description:
Take down waves of zombies to unlock new weapons and survive on earth.

You must defeat waves of hungry zombies to unlock increasingly powerful weapons and survive as long as possible.

*no internet connection required

*HD graphics

*excellent gameplay

controls on Windows:

wasd = move player

space: jump

left shift: run

g: granade

c:  crounch

e: equip weapon

mouse : look

left mouse click: shoot

right mouse click: zoom

You will get the apk and windows playable file of the game.
